reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and flattering, with one mentioning it accentuates waist and bust without showing cleavage. They appreciate its fit, with one noting it hits above the ankles, and like its style, with one highlighting its light blue sparkle. The fabric receives positive feedback for being silky and perfect for summer wear. While some customers consider it well worth the price, others feel it's not worth the cost. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful vibrant dress
items.body: Very good quality dress , airy , flowly . The color is sooo pretty , and the flowers on the dress are very vibrant that it looks amazing . I got a lot of compliments on this dress . I got a small and I weigh 129lbs , Im b36 for the chest , and 29 waist with 39 hips . It fit me amazing I had a bunch of room , it wasn’t tight at all . Read more
items.author: Marly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful !!
items.body: I bought this dress for a wedding and it looks great ! I’m 5’1 110lb 56yr old. It’s loose fitting and went down to my ankles- but I’m short even with heels. The blue color is really beautiful too. I washed it on delicate setting cold and very low heat dryer for 5 minutes only then hung up to dry overnight. It’s wrinkle resistant and easy to care for. The material feels kinda silky and was very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Trent Cahill

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: Very pretty, wash and wear. Got compliments! Very fitted at chest. If you want it looser size up. Read more
items.author: Debbie O

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Wedding Guest Outfit
items.body: It fit so well around the waist. It was modest, very comfortable. Definitely worth every penny! Wore it to a wedding and got compliments! Didn’t cling to my stomach which I try to hide and accentuated my waist and bust without showing cleavage. Read more
items.author: Kalena Danner

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress just didn’t fit me
items.body: I ordered this Pretty Garden dress to wear to the beach wedding of a granddaughter. If you want to wear this dress right out of the zip lock bag think again! The dress was neatly folded but the bag was vacuum sealed and the bag then folded in two and sealed in a mailing bag and shipped. Fortunately I am old and accustomed to ironing so it wasn’t a problem. All the shipping hard creases ironed out. The dress is polyester and the pattern gives it a shine and sparkle in the light blue that I really liked. Other positives: pockets and sewn in lining for the entire skirt. Where the dress failed for me may not fail for others. I found the smocked bodice to be too wide across the shoulders. The square neckline was just not a good look on me. It fit perfectly everywhere else. I really wanted to have it work out but I had to return it. Read more
items.author: Ginger

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black Maxi Dress
items.body: This black maxi dress is a wardrobe essential! The fabric is soft, lightweight, and flows beautifully, making it both comfortable and flattering. It’s versatile enough to dress up with heels and jewelry or keep casual with sandals and a denim jacket. The fit is true to size, and it has just the right amount of stretch. Perfect for everything from casual days to special events — an easy, elegant go-to! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good wedding guest dress!
items.body: I love this dress! I wore it to a fall wedding and it was perfect! I feel comfortable the entire night but the dress also felt structured and good quality. The length hit me perfectly at the mid ankle and I’m only 5’5. Read more
items.author: Jordan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress!
items.body: Very cute dress in a great color, but I only gave four stars because of deep wrinkles that I will try to get out of the fabric. I’ve already washed and hung to dry and pulled on it with wrinkle eraser, but so far these deep wrinkles remain. Read more
items.author: Amy Birkner Brown

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Bean Paste Red, Malachite Green, Blue, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Wine Red, Pink, Beige, Royal Blue, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
